message.text: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

steps.name: Install Compiler (Linux)
steps.run:
sudo apt-get update
if [ "${{ matrix.compiler }}" = "gcc" ]; then
  sudo apt-get install -y g++-${{ matrix.version }}
  echo "::set-env name=CC::gcc-${{ matrix.version }}"
  echo "::set-env name=CXX::g++-${{ matrix.version }}"
else
  sudo apt-get install -y clang-${{ matrix.version }}
  echo "::set-env name=CC::clang-${{ matrix.version }}"
  echo "::set-env name=CXX::clang++-${{ matrix.version }}"
fi

message.text: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

steps.name: Install Compiler (Linux)
steps.run:
sudo apt-get update
if [ "${{ matrix.compiler }}" = "gcc" ]; then
  sudo apt-get install -y g++-${{ matrix.version }}
  echo "::set-env name=CC::gcc-${{ matrix.version }}"
  echo "::set-env name=CXX::g++-${{ matrix.version }}"
else
  sudo apt-get install -y clang-${{ matrix.version }}
  echo "::set-env name=CC::clang-${{ matrix.version }}"
  echo "::set-env name=CXX::clang++-${{ matrix.version }}"
fi

steps.name: Install Compiler (macOS)
steps.run:
brew install cmake ninja
if [ "${{ matrix.compiler }}" = "gcc" ]; then
  brew install gcc@${{ matrix.version }}
  echo "::set-env name=CC::gcc-${{ matrix.version }}"
  echo "::set-env name=CXX::g++-${{ matrix.version }}"
else
  sudo xcode-select -switch /Applications/Xcode_${{ matrix.version }}.app
  echo "::set-env name=CC::clang"
  echo "::set-env name=CXX::clang++"
fi

yum -y install epel-release dnf-plugins-core
yum config-manager --set-enabled powertools

steps.name: Setup Compiler
steps.run:
yum -y install sudo clang
echo "CC=clang" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "CXX=clang++" >> $GITHUB_ENV

steps.name: Setup Compiler
steps.run:
yum -y install epel-release dnf-plugins-core sudo
yum config-manager --set-enabled powertools
yum -y install gcc-toolset-${{ matrix.version }}-gcc-c++
source /opt/rh/gcc-toolset-${{ matrix.version }}/enable

steps.name: Setup Compiler
Setup Compiler
steps.run:
brew install cmake ninja
brew install gcc@${{ matrix.version }}
echo "CC=gcc-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "CXX=g++-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV

steps.name: Setup Compiler
steps.run:
brew install cmake ninja
sudo xcode-select -switch /Applications/Xcode_${{ matrix.version }}.app
echo "CC=clang" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "CXX=clang++" >> $GITHUB_ENV

steps.name: Setup Compiler
Setup Compiler

yum -y install centos-release-scl epel-release sudo
yum -y install llvm-toolset-7.0-clang.x86_64

echo "CC=clang" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "CXX=clang++" >> $GITHUB_ENV

steps.name: Install and Test
steps.run: (scl enable llvm-toolset-${{ matrix.version }}.0 bash && ./install.sh && make tests)

steps.name: Install Compiler (Linux)
steps.run:
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y man
if [ "${{ matrix.compiler }}" = "gcc" ]; then
  sudo apt-get install -y g++-${{ matrix.version }}
  echo "CC=gcc-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV
  echo "CXX=g++-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV
else
  sudo apt-get install -y clang-${{ matrix.version }}
  echo "CC=clang-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV
  echo "CXX=clang++-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV
fi

steps.name: Install Compiler (macOS)
steps.run:
brew install cmake ninja
if [ "${{ matrix.compiler }}" = "gcc" ]; then
  brew install gcc@${{ matrix.version }}
  echo "CC=gcc-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV
  echo "CXX=g++-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV
else
  sudo xcode-select -switch /Applications/Xcode_${{ matrix.version }}.app
  echo "CC=clang" >> $GITHUB_ENV
  echo "CXX=clang++" >> $GITHUB_ENV
fi

apt-get update
apt-get install -y man g++-${{ matrix.version }}
echo "CC=gcc-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "CXX=g++-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV

steps.name: Setup Compiler
steps.run:
apt-get update
apt-get install -y man clang-${{ matrix.version }}
echo "CC=clang-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "CXX=clang++-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV

steps.name: Install AmazonLinux deps needed specifically for GitHub action
Setup Compiler
steps.run:
yum -y install man gcc-c++
echo "CC=gcc" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "CXX=g++" >> $GITHUB_ENV

steps.name: Install AmazonLinux deps needed specifically for GitHub action
Setup Compiler
steps.run:
yum -y install man clang
echo "CC=clang" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "CXX=clang++" >> $GITHUB_ENV

steps.name: Setup Compiler
steps.run:
yum -y install centos-release-scl epel-release sudo man
yum -y install devtoolset-${{ matrix.version }}

steps.name: Setup Compiler
steps.run:
brew install cmake ninja
brew install gcc@${{ matrix.version }}
echo "CC=gcc-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "CXX=g++-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV

steps.name: Setup Compiler
steps.run:
brew install cmake ninja
sudo xcode-select -switch /Applications/Xcode_${{ matrix.version }}.app
echo "CC=clang" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "CXX=clang++" >> $GITHUB_ENV

build-other-arch-gcc.name: Build in gcc-${{ matrix.version }} (${{ matrix.container }} - ${{ matrix.arch }})

with.env:
CC: gcc-${{ matrix.version }}
CXX: g++-${{ matrix.version }}
with.install:
apt-get update
apt-get install -y man sudo g++-${{ matrix.version }}

steps.name: Setup Compiler
steps.run:
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y man
if [ "${{ matrix.compiler }}" = "gcc" ]; then
  sudo apt-get install -y g++-${{ matrix.version }}
  echo "CC=gcc-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV
  echo "CXX=g++-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV
else
  sudo apt-get install -y clang-${{ matrix.version }}
  echo "CC=clang-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV
  echo "CXX=clang++-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV
fi

steps.name: Setup Compiler
steps.run:
pacman -Sy --noconfirm man-db wget curl ${{ matrix.compiler }}
pacman -Syu --noconfirm

if [ "${{ matrix.compiler }}" = "gcc" ]; then
  echo "CC=gcc" >> $GITHUB_ENV
  echo "CXX=g++" >> $GITHUB_ENV
else
  echo "CC=clang" >> $GITHUB_ENV
  echo "CXX=clang++" >> $GITHUB_ENV
fi

steps.name: Setup Compiler
steps.run:
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y man
if [ "${{ matrix.compiler }}" = "gcc" ]; then
  sudo apt-get install -y g++-${{ matrix.version }}
  echo "CC=gcc-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV
  echo "CXX=g++-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV
else
  sudo apt-get install -y clang-${{ matrix.version }}
  echo "CC=clang-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV
  echo "CXX=clang++-${{ matrix.version }}" >> $GITHUB_ENV
fi

steps.name: Setup Compiler
steps.run:
pacman -Syu --noconfirm
pacman -Sy --noconfirm man-db wget curl ${{ matrix.compiler }}

if [ "${{ matrix.compiler }}" = "gcc" ]; then
  echo "CC=gcc" >> $GITHUB_ENV
  echo "CXX=g++" >> $GITHUB_ENV
else
  echo "CC=clang" >> $GITHUB_ENV
  echo "CXX=clang++" >> $GITHUB_ENV
fi
